JAK ggplot theme

Source: R/themes.R
jak_theme.Rd

Modify theme of ggplots

Usage

jak_theme(
  base_size = 10,
  plot_title_size = 12,
  axis_title_size = 11,
  base_color = "gray30",
  plot_title_color = "gray30",
  axis_title_color = "gray30",
  bg_color = "transparent",
  grid_color = "gray80",
  border_width = 0.5,
  strip_size = 10,
  strip_color = "transparent",
  strip_line = 0,
  legend_size = 10,
  legend_position = "bottom",
  base_family = ""
)

Arguments

base_size

Font size for most things

plot_title_size

Font size for plot titles

axis_title_size

Font size for axis titles

base_color

Color for most text and lines

plot_title_color

Color for plot titles

axis_title_color

Color for axis titles

bg_color

background color

grid_color

Color for grid lines

strip_size

Font size for facet strip titles

strip_color

Color for facet strip titles

strip_line

Line width for facet strip titles

legend_size

Font size for legend

legend_position

Position of legend

base_family

Font family
